name: BLOB! (ShepherdJames)
description:
Hi!
I'm James and this is my first game ever made, an annoying two level platformer, nothing special and very short, but I still think it can  provide a few minutes of fun if you have nothing better to do :)

I am currently working on something much more serious called Apricot's Adventure, more info on twitter

Follow me:

https://twitter.com/IndieDevJames
